ref: 742 avagalati ʻ falls down, slips down ʼ Śiś. 2. With anal. -- gg -- . 3. *avagālayati with anal. gg. [Cf. *avagirati: √gal1, &rcirclemacr 1. Pk. ōgalia -- ʻ slipped down, fallen ʼ; A. uwaliba ʻ to slough off, be rotten, be shattered ʼ.
Ḍ. ogol -- ʻ to descend, get down ʼ;
G. ɔgaḷvũ ʻ to trickle down, ooze, melt ʼ;
M. ogaḷṇẽ ʻ to fall off, trickle ʼ; --
H. ogal m. ʻ moisture near surface of soil ʼ;
M. ogaḷ f.m. ʻ streamlet ʼ, vagaḷ f. ʻ refuse, dregs ʼ.
